outline map.svg | map_background = Slovakia - background map.png | map_caption = Location of Zlatá Baňa in Slovakia | map_locator = Slovakia | map1 = Prešov Region - outline map.svg | map1_background = Prešov Region - background map.png | map1_caption = Location of Zlatá Baňa in the Prešov Region | map1_locator = Prešov Region <!-- *** Websites *** --> | commons = Zlatá Baňa | statistics = [http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/prvav2.jsp?txtUroven=440707&lstObec=525472&Okruh=zaklad MOŠ/MIS] | website = [http://www.zlatabana.sk www.zlatabana.sk] <!-- *** Footnotes *** --> | footnotes = <!-- Processed by Geoboxer 3.0 on 2007-12-13T06:02:20+01:00 --> }} '''Zlatá Baňa''' ({{Lang-hu|Aranybánya}}) is a village and municipality in [[Prešov District]] in the [[Prešov Region]] of eastern [[Slovakia]]. ==Name== The name of the village means literally the "Gold Mine". ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1550. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 590 metres and covers an area of 31.732 km². It has a population of about 412. ==External links== *http://www.zlatabana.sk {{Presov District}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Prešov District]] {{Prešov-geo-stub}}
